titleStmt.title: Description of British Library, Add MS 25717: Talmud bavli (תלמוד בבלי)

availability.licence: These images and the content of British Library Add MS 25717: Talmud bavli (תלמוד בבלי) are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. See the Creative Commons Public Domain Mark page for usage details, http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/.

To the extent possible under law, British Library has waived all copyright and related or neighboring rights to this metadata about British Library Add MS 25717: Talmud bavli (תלמוד בבלי). This work is published from: United States. For a summary of CC0, see https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. Legal code: https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/legalcode.

notesStmt.note: Defective at the beginning and at the end.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1 2; ruled lines: 31; written lines: 30; Each page on folios 1-80 is divided into 2 columns of 30 lines each; on folio 89-102 the page consists of a single column of 30 lines. Visible pricking and hard-point regular ruling. Flesh side and hair side distinguishable. Many marginal notes supplied by a later cursive hand.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Ashkenazi (Greek style) square script of the end of the 13th or beginning of the 14th century.

binding.p: Post-1600. Blind-tooled brown leather. Modern BL box. Spine title: Tractatus Talmudici. Tres. Hebr. Mus. Brit. Iure Empt. 25, 717.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Joseph Leves: purchased from him by the British Museum on 09 July 1864: inscribed, folio [103v].
